item.title: Elluminate, OpenJDK and PulseAudio
item.description: I was constantly having sound issues with Elluminate after my upgrade to Fedora 15. The audio had recurring silent pauses about one second long. It was driving me crazy when I was watching recorded sessions (for on-line ones we are using tele-bridge). Today I **saw red**. I was suspecting network, but after a quick audio test (Tools - Audio - Setup Wizard) it turned out its rather java audio issue.
